settings.heading: Hyaluronic Acid + Peptides
settings.paragraph: Meet the powerful key ingredients that make it workPowerful ingredients make it work

Seaweed

A blend of Undaria and red algae brightens skin and erases fatigue by reducing crow’s feet and under eye bags.

Peptide

A biomimetic tetrapeptide that smooths the look of fine lines and wrinkles.

Quinoa

Clinically tested quinoa extract that acts as a peptide to reduce under eye puffiness.

Hyaluronic Acid

Helps hydrate and plump the skin.

settings.paragraph: Bestseller

settings.heading: Ocean Eyes <br class="xs:hidden sm:inline lg:hidden">Age-Defying Serum
settings.paragraph:
Seaweed, hyaluronic acid and peptides smooth the look of fine lines and crow’s feet. This lightweight formula reduces the appearance of dark circles and puffiness. Delivered with a cooling roller ball that awakens the eye area.
  • Absorbs quickly
  • Anti-aging
  • Energizing
  • Hydrating

settings.container_classes: container lg:max-w-screen-lg py-6 flex-col-reverse sm:flex-row gap-6

settings.heading: Step 1
settings.paragraph: Use our Plant-Based Body Brush to dry brush your entire body.

settings.heading: Step 2
settings.paragraph: Take a bath with our luxurious Vagus Nerve Bath Oil.

settings.heading: Step 3
settings.paragraph: Exfoliate your body with our mineral-rich Salts of the Earth.

settings.heading: Step 4
settings.paragraph: Finish with our Body Butter for flawless, supple skin.
